sorcer.falcon.core.exertion

Class WhileExertion

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.service.ServiceExertion
      • sorcer.falcon.core.exertion.WhileExertion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Conditional, Evaluation<Object>, ExecState, Exertion, Identifiable, Invocation<Object>, Revaluation, Service

    public class WhileExertion
extends ServiceExertion
implements Conditional
    WhileExertion is a new exertion extending from the ServiceExertion and also implements the Conditional interface . This composite exertion is compose of a condition and an Exertion Exertion. The condition is the sentinel for the main loop, it can be set by implementing the Conditional interface or for legacy provider by explicitly setting the attributes of the WhileExertion. The inner exertion can by any type of Exertion, thus allowing us to create a recursive control structure comprise of Conditional, jobs, and tasks.
    Author:
    Michael Alger
    See Also:
    Exertion, Conditional, IfExertion, WhileExertion, Serialized Form
